categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic members

nodes.text: Yalor was a Sullustan who held the rank of Major by the time of 0 ABY. He was the programmer of the Slave circuit that guided pilots through The Gauntlet.
Yalor was a Sullustan with pronounced jowls and a short stature. What set him apart in appearance was a cluster of birthmarks on his cheek that he believed to be a sign of luck.
